title.rendered: Rush Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA

content.rendered:
Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA

Rush Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA Address | Phone number | Email | Location | Opening hours, Amenities | Facilities

Address:
Rush Lounge,
Golden Nugget Hotel & Casino, Huron Ave & Brigantine Blvd., Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

Opening hours: Monday 6PM – 2AM, Tuesday 6PM – 2AM, Wednesday 6PM – 2AM, Thursday 6PM – 2AM, Friday 6PM – 4AM, Saturday 6PM – 4AM, Sunday 6PM – 2AM.

Phone number:
1 800-777-8477

Email:

View location of Rush Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA on google maps

Rush Lounge – Lounge official website: http://www.goldennugget.com/atlanticcity/drink_rushlounge.asp

Atlantic City International Airport FAA Code: ACY

Atlantic City International Airport ICAO Code: KACY

Atlantic City International Airport IATA Code: ACY

Facilities | Amenities at Atlantic City International Airport
